Class SimulatedAnnealing

java.lang.Object
SimulatedAnnealing
public class SimulatedAnnealing extends Object
A class implementing Simulated Annealing(SA) algorithm for optimizing CMCS configuration. Requires a set of heuristic components and a set of benchmark instances for training.

      public void writeToFile(String filename, double[][] msucc, double[][] mfail) throws IOException
      This method saves a configuration to file.
      Parameters:
      filename - The filename
      msucc - Success matrix of the configuration
      mfail - Fail matrix of the configuration
      Throws:
      IOException

    • createRandomMatrix

      public static double[][] createRandomMatrix(int n, int[] componentArray)
      Parameters:
      n - Number of heuristic components |H|
      componentArray - Array identifying the component types(Hill Climber/Mutator) at each index of the matrix.
      Returns:
      returns a mutated matrix.

    • randomizeMatrix

      public static double[][] randomizeMatrix(double[][] matrix, int[] componentArray)
      This mutation completely randomizes the matrix, it could be thought of as applying "randomRow" mutation to all the rows of the matrix.
      Parameters:
      matrix - A transition of the 2 CMCS transition matrices.
      componentArray - Array identifying the component types(Hill Climber/Mutator) at each index of the matrix.
      Returns:
      returns a mutated matrix.

    • randomRow

      public static double[][] randomRow(double[][] matrix, int[] componentArray)
      This mutation chooses a random row in the matrix and randomizes it.
      Parameters:
      matrix - A transition of the 2 CMCS transition matrices.
      componentArray - Array identifying the component types(Hill Climber/Mutator) at each index of the matrix.
      Returns:
      returns a mutated matrix.

    • randomValues

      public static double[][] randomValues(double[][] matrix, int[] componentArray)
      This mutation chooses a random row in the matrix and randomizes any non zero values in that row.
      Parameters:
      matrix - A transition of the 2 CMCS transition matrices.
      componentArray - Array identifying the component types(Hill Climber/Mutator) at each index of the matrix.
      Returns:
      returns a mutated matrix.

    • heuristicID

      public int[] heuristicID(List<Heuristic> heuristics)
      This method assigns IDs to the input heuristics based on their class names. If a heuristic's class name starts with "H", it is assigned 1, and if it starts with "M", it is assigned 0.
      Parameters:
      heuristics -
      Returns:
      Array with binary encoding (1 if a component is a hill climber, 0 if mutator)
